headline: Jefferies Raises Best Buy (BBY) Price Target on Expanding Advertising Division
summary: Best Buy Co., Inc. (NYSE:BBY) ranks among the best consumer electronics stocks to buy now. Jefferies maintained its Buy rating on Best Buy Co., Inc. (NYSE:BBY) and increased its price target from $88 to $95 on October 8. The firm’s favorable review of Best Buy’s financial performance was mainly driven by the company’s expanding advertising […]

headline: Best Buy Adds Halloween to its Holiday Calendar: Treats Shoppers to Holiday DoorBOOsters™ on Oct. 31
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, October 20, 2025--Before you roll your eyes — we know it's early, but Halloween has been knocking on our holiday door for a while now and we're ready to let it join the party. This year, we’re putting the creep in "holiday creep" and officially kicking off the holiday shopping season on — you guessed it — Halloween, complete with a set of can’t-miss DoorBOOsters™! (See what we did there?)
